name: Fried Egg
instructions: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Crack egg into pan. Cook until whites are set but yolk is still runny, about 3-4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Beat eggs with milk. Melt butter in pan over medium heat. Pour in eggs and gently stir until soft curds form. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter. Pour batter onto hot griddle. Flip when bubbles form. Cook until golden brown.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice. Place cheese between bread with buttered sides out. Grill in pan over medium heat until golden and cheese melts.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Saute onion and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer 20 minutes. Blend until smooth. Stir in cream and basil. Season to taste.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce and place in bowl. Add croutons and shaved parmesan. Toss with dressing and lemon juice. Serve immediately.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry bacon until crispy. Beat eggs with cheese. Toss hot pasta with bacon, then quickly mix in eggs. Season with pepper.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cut chicken into pieces. Stir fry in hot oil with garlic and ginger. Add vegetables. Mix in soy sauce and cornstarch slurry. Cook until thickened.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown beef and drain fat. Add seasoning and water. Simmer 5 minutes. Fill shells with beef and toppings.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Fold in chips. Bake at 375°F for 10 minutes.

name: French Toast
instructions: Beat eggs with milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Dip bread in mixture. Cook in buttered pan until golden. Serve with syrup.

name: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Cook pasta. Make roux with butter and flour. Add milk and cook until thick. Stir in cheese until melted. Mix with pasta.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Boil chicken in broth. Remove and shred. Saute vegetables. Add broth, chicken, and noodles. Simmer until noodles are tender.

name: Pizza Margherita
instructions: Roll out dough. Spread sauce, add cheese. Bake at 475°F for 12-15 minutes. Top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil.

name: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados. Mix in lime juice, diced tomato, onion, cilantro, and jalapeno. Season with salt. Serve with chips.

name: Brownies
instructions: Melt butter with sugar and cocoa. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Fold in flour and salt. Add chips. Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes.

name: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Bread chicken with egg and breadcrumb-parmesan mix. Fry until golden. Top with sauce and mozzarella. Bake at 400°F until cheese melts.

name: Fried Rice
instructions: Use day-old rice. Scramble eggs and set aside. Stir fry vegetables and garlic. Add rice and soy sauce. Mix in eggs and green onions.

name: Beef Burger
instructions: Form beef into patties and season. Grill 4 minutes per side for medium. Add cheese in last minute. Serve on buns with toppings.

name: Banana Bread
instructions: Mash bananas. Cream butter and sugar. Beat in eggs. Mix in bananas and vanilla. Fold in dry ingredients. Bake at 350°F for 60 minutes.

name: Chicken Wings
instructions: Season wings and bake at 400°F for 45 minutes, flipping halfway. Toss with melted butter and hot sauce mixture.

name: Mashed Potatoes
instructions: Boil potatoes until tender. Drain and mash. Add butter, warm milk, and minced garlic. Whip until fluffy. Season to taste.

name: Quesadilla
instructions: Fill tortilla with cheese, chicken, and vegetables. Fold in half. Cook in pan until golden and cheese melts. Cut and serve with toppings.

name: Chili
instructions: Brown beef with onions. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Serve with cheese and sour cream.

name: Pasta Alfredo
instructions: Cook pasta. Melt butter and saute garlic. Add cream and simmer. Stir in parmesan until smooth. Toss with pasta.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables and combine in bowl. Add olives and crumbled feta. Dress with olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano.

name: BBQ Ribs
instructions: Rub ribs with spices. Wrap in foil and bake at 275°F for 3 hours. Unwrap, brush with BBQ sauce. Broil until caramelized.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk in wet ingredients. Pour into greased pans. Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes. Cool and frost.

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season and grill fish. Flake into pieces. Fill shells with fish, shredded cabbage, avocado. Drizzle with chipotle mayo and lime.

name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Saute vegetables. Add broth, tomatoes, and beans. Simmer 20 minutes. Add pasta and spinach. Cook until pasta is tender.

name: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef. Coat with flour. Add vegetables and broth. Add herbs and tomato paste. Simmer 2 hours until tender.

name: Apple Pie
instructions: Slice apples and toss with sugar, spices, and flour. Fill pie crust. Dot with butter. Cover with top crust. Bake at 375°F for 50 minutes.

name: Potato Salad
instructions: Boil potatoes and eggs. Chop into chunks. Mix with chopped vegetables, mayo, and mustard. Season and chill before serving.

name: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables. Saute with seasoning until cooked. Serve in warm tortillas with toppings.

name: Pulled Pork
instructions: Rub pork with spices. Slow cook at 250°F for 8 hours. Shred meat. Mix with BBQ sauce. Serve on buns.

name: Lasagna
instructions: Brown beef. Layer noodles, ricotta mix, beef, sauce, and mozzarella. Repeat layers. Top with cheese. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

name: Coleslaw
instructions: Shred cabbage and carrots. Mix mayo, vinegar, sugar, and seasonings. Toss with vegetables. Refrigerate 1 hour before serving.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Saute onion, garlic, and ginger. Add curry powder. Cook chicken. Add tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer 20 minutes. Serve over rice.

name: Meatloaf
instructions: Mix all ingredients except half the ketchup. Form into loaf. Top with remaining ketchup. Bake at 350°F for 1 hour.

name: Corn Chowder
instructions: Cook bacon and set aside. Saute vegetables in bacon fat. Make roux with butter and flour. Add milk and corn. Simmer until thick.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook pasta. Saute garlic in butter. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Add wine and lemon juice. Toss with pasta and parsley.

name: Chicken Salad
instructions: Cook and dice chicken. Mix with chopped celery, halved grapes, and almonds. Combine with mayo and lemon juice. Season to taste.

name: Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Cut tops off peppers. Brown beef with onion and garlic. Mix with cooked rice and sauce. Stuff peppers. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak noodles. Scramble eggs. Stir fry shrimp. Add noodles and sauce. Toss with sprouts and peanuts. Garnish with lime and green onions.

name: Deviled Eggs
instructions: Hard boil eggs. Halve and remove yolks. Mash yolks with mayo, mustard, vinegar, and seasonings. Pipe into whites. Sprinkle with paprika.

name: Chicken Enchiladas
instructions: Shred cooked chicken. Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese. Roll and place in dish. Cover with sauce and cheese. Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes.

name: Hummus
instructions: Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic until smooth. Drizzle in olive oil. Season with cumin and salt. Serve with pita.

name: Clam Chowder
instructions: Cook bacon. Saute vegetables. Make roux. Add clam juice and potatoes. Simmer until tender. Stir in clams and cream. Heat through.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Brown beef strips. Saute mushrooms and onion. Make sauce with broth and flour. Add sour cream. Combine with beef. Serve over noodles.

name: Chicken Pot Pie
instructions: Mix chicken, vegetables, soup, and milk. Pour into pie crust. Top with second crust. Bake at 425°F for 30 minutes until golden.

name: Tiramisu
instructions: Whip egg yolks with sugar. Fold in mascarpone. Dip ladyfingers in espresso. Layer with cream. Repeat. Dust with cocoa. Chill overnight.

name: Cobb Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce and arrange on plate. Top with rows of diced chicken, crumbled bacon, eggs, avocado, tomatoes, and cheese. Serve with dressing.

name: Meatballs
instructions: Mix beef, breadcrumbs, egg, cheese, garlic, and parsley. Form into balls. Brown in pan. Simmer in marinara for 20 minutes.

name: Shepherd's Pie
instructions: Brown lamb with onion. Add vegetables, tomato paste, and worcestershire. Transfer to dish. Top with mashed potatoes and cheese. Bake at 400°F for 25 minutes.

name: Pancit
instructions: Soak noodles. Stir fry chicken and shrimp. Add vegetables. Mix in noodles and soy sauce. Toss until noodles are tender.

name: Pork Chops
instructions: Season and flour chops. Brown in butter 4 minutes per side. Remove. Make pan sauce with garlic, thyme, and broth. Pour over chops.

name: Bruschetta
instructions: Toast bread slices. Mix diced tomatoes, basil, garlic, oil, and vinegar. Season. Top bread with mixture. Serve immediately.

name: Cheesecake
instructions: Mix crushed crackers with butter for crust. Beat cream cheese with sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Pour over crust. Bake at 325°F for 55 minutes.

name: Lemon Bars
instructions: Make shortbread crust and bake. Whisk eggs, sugar, lemon juice, and zest. Pour over crust. Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes. Dust with powdered sugar.

name: Tuna Salad
instructions: Drain tuna. Mix with chopped celery, onion, mayo, and lemon juice. Season to taste. Serve on bread or crackers.

name: Spring Rolls
instructions: Soak rice paper. Layer with noodles, shrimp, vegetables, and herbs. Roll tightly. Serve with peanut sauce.

name: Baked Salmon
instructions: Place salmon on foil. Drizzle with oil. Top with lemon slices, garlic, and dill. Season. Wrap loosely. Bake at 400°F for 15 minutes.

name: Chicken Teriyaki
instructions: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, ginger, and garlic. Marinate chicken. Cook chicken until done. Thicken sauce with cornstarch. Serve over rice.

name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
instructions: Mix all ingredients. Transfer to baking dish. Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes until bubbly. Serve with chips or bread.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Saute mushrooms. Saute onion and rice. Add wine. Gradually add warm broth, stirring constantly. Fold in mushrooms, butter, and cheese.

name: Biscuits and Gravy
instructions: Make biscuits and bake. Brown sausage. Make roux with drippings and flour. Add milk and cook until thick. Pour gravy over biscuits.

name: Chicken Marsala
instructions: Pound and flour chicken. Brown in butter. Saute mushrooms and garlic. Add wine and broth. Return chicken. Simmer until sauce thickens.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Layer alternating with basil leaves. Drizzle with oil and balsamic. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Cornbread
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk wet ingredients. Combine. Pour into greased pan. Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until golden.

name: Buffalo Chicken Dip
instructions: Mix shredded chicken with softened cream cheese, buffalo sauce, and ranch. Stir in half the cheese. Top with remaining cheese. Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes.

name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, and cheese. Drizzle in oil until smooth. Toss with hot pasta. Season with salt.

name: Onion Rings
instructions: Slice onions into rings. Dip in flour, then egg-milk mixture, then breadcrumbs. Deep fry at 375°F until golden. Season with salt.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
instructions: Grill chicken and slice. Layer lettuce, chicken, cheese, croutons, and dressing on tortilla. Roll tightly and cut in half.

name: Egg Salad
instructions: Hard boil and chop eggs. Mix with mayo, mustard, chopped celery, and green onion. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with paprika.

name: Sweet Potato Fries
instructions: Cut sweet potatoes into fries. Toss with oil and seasonings. Spread on baking sheet. Bake at 425°F for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
instructions: Layer chicken, cheese, and vegetables on tortilla. Top with another tortilla. Cook in pan until cheese melts and tortilla is crispy. Cut into wedges.

name: Ramen
instructions: Simmer broth with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Add mushrooms. Cook noodles separately. Soft boil eggs. Assemble with noodles, broth, eggs, and green onions.

name: Salisbury Steak
instructions: Mix beef, breadcrumbs, egg, and onion. Form patties. Brown in pan. Make gravy with broth, mushrooms, and worcestershire. Simmer patties in gravy.

name: Garlic Bread
instructions: Mix softened butter with minced garlic, parsley, and salt. Spread on sliced bread. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 375°F for 10 minutes.

name: Fried Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in buttermilk. Mix flour with seasonings. Coat chicken. Deep fry at 350°F for 15-18 minutes until golden and cooked through.

name: Pumpkin Pie
instructions: Mix pumpkin, eggs, sugar, spices, and milk. Pour into pie crust. Bake at 425°F for 15 minutes, then 350°F for 45 minutes.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook pasta. Grill chicken and slice. Make alfredo sauce with butter, cream, garlic, and cheese. Toss pasta with sauce. Top with chicken.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown beef and add seasoning with water. Simmer 5 minutes. Warm tortillas. Fill with beef and desired toppings.

name: Nachos
instructions: Layer chips on baking sheet. Top with seasoned beef, beans, and cheese. Bake at 350°F until cheese melts. Add fresh toppings.

name: Pho
instructions: Simmer broth with charred onion, ginger, and spices for hours. Cook noodles. Assemble with noodles, raw beef, hot broth, and fresh toppings.

name: Carrot Cake
instructions: Mix grated carrots, flour, sugar, eggs, oil, and spices. Bake at 350°F for 35 minutes. Make frosting with cream cheese, butter, and powdered sugar.

name: Crab Cakes
instructions: Mix crab with breadcrumbs, mayo, egg, and seasonings. Form into patties. Pan fry until golden on both sides. Serve with lemon.

name: French Onion Soup
instructions: Caramelize sliced onions in butter for 45 minutes. Add wine and broth. Simmer 30 minutes. Top with bread and cheese. Broil until cheese melts.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill. Make sauce with butter, onion, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, and cream. Simmer chicken in sauce.

name: Club Sandwich
instructions: Toast bread. Layer turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and mayo between three slices. Secure with toothpicks. Cut into quarters.

name: Potato Soup
instructions: Saute vegetables. Add broth and potatoes. Simmer until tender. Make roux. Add milk and cheese. Blend half the soup. Combine. Top with bacon.

name: Beef and Broccoli
instructions: Marinate sliced beef in soy sauce and cornstarch. Stir fry beef. Set aside. Stir fry broccoli. Add beef back with sauce. Serve over rice.

name: Banana Pudding
instructions: Prepare pudding according to package. Layer pudding, sliced bananas, and wafers in dish. Repeat layers. Top with whipped cream. Chill before serving.

name: Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, herbs, and spices. Mix in flour and baking powder. Form into balls. Deep fry until golden. Serve in pita.

name: Tres Leches Cake
instructions: Bake sponge cake. Poke holes. Mix three milks and vanilla. Pour over cake. Refrigerate overnight. Top with whipped cream before serving.

name: General Tso Chicken
instructions: Coat chicken in cornstarch. Fry until crispy. Make sauce with soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, garlic, ginger, and chilies. Toss chicken in sauce.

name: Chocolate Mousse
instructions: Melt chocolate. Whip egg whites with sugar to stiff peaks. Whip cream. Fold chocolate into egg whites. Fold in whipped cream. Chill 2 hours.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Use day-old rice. Scramble eggs. Stir fry chicken. Add vegetables. Add rice and soy sauce. Mix in eggs and green onions. Serve hot.
